mapper.sql: ID, warehourseID, warehourseName, clientID, clientName, principalID, principalName, createTime, checkTime, gatherTime, returnTime, posTime, status, sumPrice, gather, change, margin, type, note, exception
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE ${tablename} ( `ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '记录订单ID', `warehourseID` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '仓库（门店）ID', `warehourseName` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `clientID` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '客户ID', `clientName` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `principalID` varchar(45) NOT NULL COMMENT '负责人ID', `principalName` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `createTime` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', `checkTime` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '审核时间', `gatherTime` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '收款时间', `returnTime` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '退款时间', `posTime` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'pos时间', `status` int(11) NOT NULL, `sumPrice` float DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '总价', `gather` float DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '收款', `change` float DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '找零', `margin` float DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '利润', `type` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '订单类型', `note` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '备注信息', `exception` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '异动信息', PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='记录销售单里面的共同信息';
mapper.insert: insert into ${tablename} (ID, warehourseID, warehourseName, clientID, clientName, principalID, principalName, createTime, checkTime, gatherTime, returnTime, posTime, status, sumPrice, gather, change, margin, type, note, exception) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{warehourseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{warehoursename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clientname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gathertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returntime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sumprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{gather,jdbcType=REAL}, #{change,jdbcType=REAL}, #{margin,jdbcType=REAL}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exception,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ${tablename}
ID,
warehourseID,
warehourseName,
clientID,
clientName,

createTime,
checkTime,
gatherTime,
returnTime,
posTime,
status,

gather,
`change`,
margin,
type,
note,
exception,

mapper.update:
update ${tablename}
warehourseID = #{warehourseid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
warehourseName = #{warehoursename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
clientID = #{clientid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
clientName = #{clientname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
principalID = #{principalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
principalName = #{principalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkTime = #{checktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gatherTime = #{gathertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
returnTime = #{returntime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
posTime = #{postime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sumPrice = #{sumprice,jdbcType=REAL},
gather = #{gather,jdbcType=REAL},
`change` = #{change,jdbcType=REAL},
margin = #{margin,jdbcType=REAL},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exception = #{exception,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ${tablename} set warehourseID = #{warehourseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, warehourseName = #{warehoursename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clientID = #{clientid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, clientName = #{clientname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principalID = #{principalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principalName = #{principalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checkTime = #{checktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gatherTime = #{gathertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, returnTime = #{returntime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, posTime = #{postime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sumPrice = #{sumprice,jdbcType=REAL}, gather = #{gather,jdbcType=REAL}, `change` = #{change,jdbcType=REAL}, margin = #{margin,jdbcType=REAL}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exception = #{exception,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
